overview: KUROBAS CUP 2015 is the event following KUROBAS CUP 2013 that took place on September 20th (Sunday). Similarly to KUROBAS CUP 2013, the event features the majority of the voice actors from the Seirin basketball team, together with Kise, Midorima, Aomine, Takao, along with new additions such as Murasakibara, Himuro, along with Rakuzan's Mibuchi, Hayama and Mayuzumi.
title: KUROBAS CUP 2015
